DataElement.preferredName: AUDIT 1 How Often Have Alcoholic Drink Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response about how often they have a drink containing alcohol, using a 5 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test How Often Have Alcoholic Drink Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported assessment developed by the World Health Organization (WHO) as a simple method of screening for excessive drinking. It can help in identifying excessive drinking as the cause of the presenting illness._A question about how often an individual has or had a drink containing alcohol.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).
